name: Scrolls, Please
description:
A Papers Please inspired medieval low fantasy game, where you play as a castle guard determining whether to let in certain people. I'm sure you can tell but this game was not finished as we ran out of time, but I still enjoyed making it and I feel it gave me better insight into how to make a successful game

The Font used in this game was taken from the simple Pixel UI pack which can be found on the unity asset store for free.
